section.p:
Bugs should be reported to one of the following:
Henri Yandell
The osjava-users mailing list: http://lists.osjava.org/mailman/listinfo/osjava-users
The OsJava issue tracker: http://issues.osjava.org:8080/jira/secure/BrowseProject.jspa?id=10021
Please report them, you'll be doing Scraping-Engine a great service.
